news.title: Paramount guarantees Larry Ellison backing in amended WBD bid
news.summary: Paramount notably did not increase its bid on Monday, reiterating that it believes the deal is superior to Netflix's. Paramount is seeking to buy the streaming giant's streaming service.

news.title: Supplements in your stocking: Why wellness gifts are gaining steam for the holidays and beyond
news.summary: Retailers are blurring the lines between beauty and wellness. Customers look for holiday gifts and focus on self-care, experts say.

news.title: Gold and silver prices soar to new highs as the yellow metal reemerges as a hedge
news.summary: The race for the next chair of the Federal Reserve weighs on investors' minds. It comes as fiscal deficits and the race for a Federal Reserve chair weigh on investors.

news.title: Disney's 'Avatar: Fire and Ash' disappoints with weak $88 million domestic opening
news.summary: "Avatar: Fire and Ash" tallied just $88 million during its domestic debut. That's well shy of the $110 million to $125 million range analysts had expected.

news.title: Epstein files: DOJ restores image showing Trump after backlash
news.summary: The Department of Justice faces criticism for not releasing all of the Epstein files on Friday, despite a law signed by President Donald Trump requiring it.

news.title: How this commodity trader is preparing for a second wave of inflation
news.summary: A similar pattern to the 1970’s may be on the cards, says this former commodity trader. The U.S. economy is expected to continue to grow in the next few years.

news.title: ‘I’m not looking to leave any money to the kids’: We’re in our 60s with $1.5 million in IRAs. Can we retire next year?
news.summary: “Our current salary combined is $210,000,” he says. “We’re in a position of power. We’ve got to do something.”

news.title: Okta CEO Todd McKinnon has words of caution for people jumping ship to work at AI startups
news.summary: As his coworkers bailed for ‘sexy’ jobs at internet startups during the height of the dot-com boom, McKinnon made a seemingly boring decision.

news.title: Honeywell says it has a $470 million Flexjet problem, and a lowered profit outlook
news.summary: Honeywell expects to make a one-time cash settlement payment of $470 million related to the Flexjet lawsuit — and the stock drops.

news.title: Young crypto bros love to gamble — and you’ll never guess where they get the money
news.summary: Crypto holders with college degrees and full-time jobs gamble at much higher rates than non-holders. Crypto holders with College degrees and Full-time Jobs gamble at more than twice the rate of non- holders.
